title: The Dancing feet
creator_credit: Films Division, Government of India, V. Shantaram and A. Bhaskar Rao
brief_description: The role of the dance in Indian life. People of rural India singing and dancing together. Dances of different regions brought together in this film include Gujerat, Kulu, Kerala, eastern India, Deccan Kashmir and Rajasthan and the Punjab.
creator_credit_for_label: Films Division, Government of India, V. Shantaram and A. Bhaskar Rao
